page.title: 10Ringmer Roads and Footpaths
page.content: {Ringmer}has a straight road running right through the centre of it. It seems as if Ringmer is two separate villages. Off the main road are several wandering lanes which run through countryside or new housing estates. Some of the roads are named after famous Ringmer people such as{ {Springett, Harvard, Penn}and{Christie. Ringmer is a good place for cycling because the village is quite flat. If you are travelling by foot there are many shortcuts called by the old {Sussex}name of{"twitten".}There are many well marked footpaths preserved by the{Lewes Footpaths Group.}Most of the footpaths run through farmland or downland.
